get.description: Gets a User Avatar image file

put.description: Adds a User Avatar image file

post.description: Registers a newly created User. User must be invited to be registered. More common process for adding user is for user to be generated with a Service Request.

Suspends a User which will cancel all users services in Stripe and in Servicebot and mark the user as suspended. Users automatically become suspended if there are payment failures (like expired cards). You can also manually suspend users which will trigger a webhook which can notify your application for application access restriction.
Unsuspends a User changing their status from 'suspended' to 'active'. It does not resubscribe User to all previous subscriptions.
Invites a new User responding with an invitation URL for the user to go to to complete registration. More common process for adding user is for user to be generated with a Service Request.

post.summary: Get a token for a user
post.description: As an authenticated admin, gets an auth token for a user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: user to get a token for

200.description: API JSON Web token for specified user

get.summary: Gets all roles with array of permission ids
get.description: Gets all the roles in the system with all the permissions in that role.

post.description: Batch update roles with permission Ids.

get.description: Gets all published Service Templates. Templates default to published when created. Does not need Auth.
Gets Service Template Icon file

put.description: Adds a Service Template Icon file

delete.description: Deletes a Service Template Icon file

get.description: Gets a Service Template Image file

put.description: Adds a Service Template Image file

delete.description: Deletes a Service Template Image file

get.description: Gets a request template for requesting a Service Instance of the Service Template

post.description: Requests a Service Instance. Can make this call unauthorized, but must also send 'email', 'password' and 'token_id' in the request JSON. 'token_id' is a Stripe Token: https://stripe.com/docs/api#token_object Can use 'tok_visa' for testing. If using synchronous webhooks, you will find the response of the webhook in webhook_responses.
If an instance was requested by an admin, for a user, they must approve of the Service request. Approving the Service Instance will proceed with charges if there are any and begin the subscription.
Reactivates a cancelled Service Instance, triggering a webhook. Once subscription is reactivated, charges will resume.

post.summary: Change a Service Instance payment plan
post.description: Updates the payment plan of a Service Instance. Use to modify price, period, interval, or trial.

interval_count.description: Number of intervals in a period, for example with a monthly interval and interval_count of 1, customer charged every month

post.description: Changes a Service Instance properties, can affect instance pricing if subscription and the properties modify price.
Cancels a Service Instance. Can only be performed by Admin or Staff.

post.summary: Request Cancellation of a Service Instance
post.description: Requests Cancellation a Service Instance. Can be performed by Admin and Users.

post.summary: Add a charge to a Service Instance
post.description: Adds a charge to a Service Instance.

parameters.name: charge
parameters.description: Charge to add to Service Instance

get.summary: Get awaiting charges of Service Instance
get.description: Gets not yet paid charges of Service Instance.

post.summary: Approve Charges on a Service Instance
post.description: Approves pending charges on a Service Instance.

get.description: Gets the value of an Instance's metric. Use this call along with the POST call to increment or set a metric from your app.

post.description: Modifies an Instance's metric. Automatically adjusts and prorates billing.

get.summary: Get Seats on a service instance
get.description: Gets the seats associated with a service instance.

post.summary: Add a seat to an instance
post.description: Adds seat to an Instance using email. If user does not exist, invitation email is set (can be turned off with notification templates), and webhook is triggered.

delete.summary: Remove a seat from an instance
delete.description: Removes the seats associated with a service instance by Id.

post.description: Resends seat invitation using Seat Id. Invitation email is set (can be turned off with notification templates), and webhook is triggered.
Adds a Service Instance File

get.description: Gets Service Instance files

get.summary: Get Service Instance file by id
get.description: Gets a Service Instance file by id

post.summary: Approve a Service Instance Cancellation request
post.description: Approves a Service Instance Cancellation request

post.summary: Reject a Service Instance Cancellation request
post.description: Rejects a Service Instance Cancellation request. For Admins.

post.summary: Undo a Service Instance Cancellation request
post.description: Undoes a Service Instance Cancellation request for the user who requested it.

get.description: Gets the seat data of the authenticated user.
Gets the upcoming invoices for a User by id

post.description: Refunds an invoice by Id. Can perform partial refund by passing 'amount' field in body.

get.description: Gets all System Options

parameters.name: System Options
parameters.description: An array of System Options to create

get.description: Gets all public System Options

get.summary: Get a System Option by Id
get.description: Gets a System Option by Id
Gets a System File Option. Ids are 'front_page_image', 'brand_logo'.

put.description: Updates a System File Option. Ids are 'front_page_image', 'brand_logo'.

get.description: Gets System version

post.description: Approves a Charge Item added onto a Service Instance. Use POST /service-instances/{id}/add-charge to add charges and GET /service-instances/{id}/awaiting-charges to get charges for an Instance.
Cancels a Charge Item added onto a Service Instance. Use POST /service-instances/{id}/add-charge to add charges and GET /service-instances/{id}/awaiting-charges to get charges for an Instance.
Gets an Authorization Token. Use to authenticate all other calls with the header 'Authorization' and value 'JWT generated_token'
Clears authorized session for token used in call made.
Sends Reset password email to user passed in body. No authorization needed.

get.description: Checks is the password reset token passed as parameter is valid, and returns true or false.

post.description: Resets a user's password using the user's id, password reset token, and new password.

get.description: Gets all Analytics Data from Servicebot instance

get.summary: Get all instance properties from a template
get.description: Get all instance properties from a template id. Gather analytics from a single Service template to see commonalities for the fields you are asking from your users in signup.

post.summary: First call to make to change stripe keys
Second call to make to change stripe keys
